title: makarajyOthi
sahitya:
makarajyOti divya darishanamE!

nigarilAda nityAnandam tandiDumE!  

anupallavi  

sakala janangaLum kaNDu magizhndiDum

nikhila niranjana dIpamenat tigazhum  

caraNam  

oppuvamai  illA uNmaip poruLAgi

citparar gnAniyar uLmana oLiyAgi

aRpudan ayyanin tiruvoLiyAgi

ceppaRkariya siva kAmavardhani Agiya
